summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 16%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 460 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 22 miles), cloud levels (up 365 m), outside temperature (up 3.6°C), and feels like temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 460.3m lower than yesterday, 356.1m lower than past week, 365.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 436m and a peak of 1505m, averaging 488.6m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and mostly calm with light air movement. Chance of light rain, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and the light is absent. Weather patterns to stay the same.
